name: unsensitized
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
An unsensitized organism has not been treated in order to make it likely to react to a substance: The unsensitised particles did not show any reaction with the sera. The cells were either sensitized with the antigen or were unsensitized (control) cells. unsensitized mice A respiratory sensitizer is a substance in the air that can cause someone's respiratory system to develop a condition that makes them over-react if the substance is inhaled again, even in amounts that have no effect on unsensitized people.
More examplesFewer examplesThe ability of lymphoid cells from unsensitized mice to kill lymphoid target cell lines was investigated.The positive results were tested with unsensitised particles to rule out non-specific reactions.This may have occurred during the penetration of the skin of unsensitized mice.
